name: THE GREATEST SHOW
description:
Sihir Senin Süper Gücün!

  This game was made in three days for Mağara Jam 4 hosted by at0m
  The magician that just trying to put on a good show,  takes the show to another dimension with a small mistake. Maybe this mistake was part of the show...

  Sadece güzel bir şov sergilemeye çalışan sihirbaz, küçük bir hatayla şovu başka bir boyuta taşıyor. Belki de bu hata şovun bir parçasıdır...


Gameplay and Controls:

Jump with W key / SPACE bar  
Move left with A key
Move right with D key 
You can switch between the objects with Q and E
You can open the doors with F key. 
Also the bird can carry objects by pressing the F key and the rabbit gnaws objects by pressing the F key.
You can explode animals with mouse right click.
There are some bugs we're sorry for that. (in third and fifth levels)  If you can't pass the level you can skip the current level with M+G  keys.


       SKILLS
       Press key 1 
You have to use your head to pass some places / You have to put your head into the certain places

    Press key 2 
If you can't do anything, I recommend using the bird. It will really work for you / You can carry the rabbit, the head and the dice with the bird.



        Press key 3
The rabbit can jump high, go through pipes and gnaw some obstacles. You can press keys too but you can only press the buttons if it's on the ground.

         Left mouse button
Don't belittle it by calling it card, you can't do anything without your cards /With the help of the card, you can press the keys and cut the ropes, but you can only press the keys on the wall.
